html:
4.8.17  3:49 pm   Do you consider yourself a comedian?

     no

4.8.17  3:29 pm   Can you describe yourself as an narcissistic egoist?

     i would prefer to be myself instead of describing myself

4.8.17  3:29 pm   why do you always come up with dumb answers i mean like i need help and you're like huh whats a world

     i'm sorry
4.8.17  3:27 pm   y u no answer my time-consuming questions

4.8.17  2:42 pm   what's it like to work on the video

     nice

4.8.17  2:22 pm   On Saturday, April 8, at 2:19 PM, there were 11519 Es on this page. There were also 1180 Vs on this page at that time. Additionally, there were 24294 spaces on this page, also at that time. I hope you find this interesting.

     ah, thank you
4.8.17  1:29 pm   bill im rlly sad and idk what to do anymore

4.8.17  1:21 pm   is the universe infinite?

     i think so

4.8.17  1:20 pm   recently i've been trying to use math as proof to show that the universe has meaning. is this reasonable?

     if you are trying to prove that it has meaning, then i think you have already proved that it has meaning

4.8.17  1:02 pm   How can we tell what notes you've added most recently?

     just start reading some, and if you don't remember it, then either it is newly added, or you haven't read it before, or you did read it before but don't remember it. either way, it should be a new experience for you

4.8.17  12:45 pm   so i started keeping tabs on this question page in jan- and it was busy, but now the questions have increased tenfold. If you reach fame, and the questions continue to roll in, will you still answer them?

     yes

4.8.17  11:04 am   After this video are you going to continue being reasonable?

     oh hell yeah

4.8.17  10:44 am   What's your 0pinion of the moon?

     it is nice, and helpful

4.8.17  10:37 am   do you ever practice composing in different musical styles so that you can compose all kinds of music?

     practice? forget that, i say do it for real!

4.8.17  10:26 am   how do i not die

     drink a lot of water, breathe, walk. once you have those things under control, you can spice it up a bit

4.8.17  9:16 am   what is an actual reason to stay alive?

     to see what else you can do

4.8.17  8:47 am   Is the word'snigger' racist?

     i guess if you want it to be

4.8.17  8:29 am   Your longest song is 4:22. Do you expect your new songs to be about that length?

     absolutely not. i really prefer to keep it under 3:30

4.8.17  7:47 am   where do your pearls of wisdom come from

     the entire world is wisdom. just go for a swim

4.8.17  7:46 am   How have you been feeling lately? I felt like asking this question. Some thing from the back of my mind tells me that you've been trying to get it together and find some more motivation. I might be wrong since I overthink often. Here's another question: how do you motivate yourself to get things done? (please describe the whole process; that is if you can, have the time to and want to. I am currently looking to motivate myself to do things by asking people like you and try the answers I get. I would really appreciate it. Other than that, best wishes and may you have a good time, Bill.)

     you might be better off doing a thing that you already have overwhelming motivation to do. it's going to work better, and chances are it will be a better thing for you to do

4.8.17  7:42 am   would u come with me to a concert on July 13th so I don't have to go alone? it's in London

     i'm typically very uncomfortable at concerts where i'm not on stage

4.8.17  7:25 am   how cold do you like your water? (to drink)

     just above freezing
4.8.17  7:09 am   What is your daily life like?

4.8.17  6:45 am   how do we know that everything around us is real? do you ever think about stuff like that?

     if it is not, then what the hell are we using the word real for

4.8.17  5:51 am   I get the feeling you are very very close to releasing the video. Is within the next week plausible?

     almost

4.8.17  5:51 am   go buy ya mom a house

     i will soon

4.8.17  5:50 am   Bill, please don't go.

     where

4.8.17  5:05 am   Would it bother you if you wanted your new video to be serious, but people end up taking it as a comedy due to the previous feel of History of Japan?

     if you think history of japan is 'comedy' then you will think this one is 'comedy' even more

4.8.17  4:51 am   why dont you do more of that thing you're good at

     because i am busy doing another thing i am good at
4.8.17  4:31 am   What is your favorite number?

4.8.17  4:03 am   Is Bb7 better as an augmented or diminished chord?

     it is neither but i have no idea what you are asking

4.8.17  3:42 am   So... I love to create and work my thing. Music, mostly. I rarely lose focus but I also have a passion for gear, which I sometimes wonder if its just a shallow pursuit. What do you think about this?

     it is a wonderful pursuit. it is right for some people, and not others. it is important for those Not inspired by gear to not feel 'guilty' for not pursuing 'good gear.' just the same, if you are inspired by it you should not feel guilty pursuing it

     You seem to keep your gear needs/usage/owning to a bare minimum and it works great. Second question: is there some gear you would acquire given the time/money/need/whatever besides a more powerful computer and music software?

     sure. but you never know what it is until you find it

4.8.17  2:54 am   where am I from

     i'm not sure

4.8.17  2:49 am   What's most important in life?

     the element of surprise

4.8.17  2:09 am   has there been any time during the process of creating the new video where you thought, "i might actually finish this tomorrow"?

     not the entire thing. but certain tasks yes

4.8.17  1:15 am   Is success possible to obtain?

     yes, over and over again

4.8.17  12:58 am   Did you know there's 11,205 E's on this page, counting this question?

     this question was not on the page at the time you counted, and now there are many more questions on the page than when you counted. so your answer was unfortunately never correct
4.8.17  12:33 am   bill can you help me?

4.8.17  12:24 am   What is your opinion on siggers (people who put their signature on their questions)?

     it is interesting because it causes controversy and drama on the questions page
4.7.17  11:52 pm   how big is ya bepis

4.7.17  11:51 pm   do you feel like there is any greater meaning to each and every person's existence,

     than what

      or we are all here just to be here?

     being here is a central part of the purpose of being here. i am not sure if that answers your question
4.7.17  11:25 pm   have you ever asked yourself a question on this page?

4.7.17  11:24 pm   What does it all mean?

     everything

4.7.17  10:44 pm   what would u ask yaself

     if what

4.7.17  10:39 pm   will you upload the new video in the next 400000 octillion years?

     yes

4.7.17  10:28 pm   do you like math

     oh hell yeah

4.7.17  9:15 pm   Is this video gonna be normal crazy, really crazy, off the charts crazy, some other type of crazy... ?

     serious

4.7.17  8:59 pm   What is a day in the life for bill wurtz like?

     work on the thing

4.7.17  8:58 pm   What's the legality of using your music

     i'm not sure. i know i can use it

4.7.17  6:32 pm   Does it seem almost plausible for the video to be out by next week?

     yes
